name: Dream Job: Delivery Simulator
description:
In this pre-solar punk dream state delivery simulator game, players take on the role of a futuristic delivery person navigating a city full of unique challenges and obstacles. The world is a mix of old and new technologies, with a vintage aesthetic mixed with advanced machinery. Players must manage their time, resources, and vehicle while navigating through a diverse and colorful world. As they deliver packages to different locations, they'll encounter a variety of characters and challenges, each with their own story to tell. With an immersive world and challenging gameplay, this game offers a unique and engaging experience for players looking to explore a vibrant and imaginative universe.

The game will get updates. There are some part of this game is not fully accessible. We will try to release the patches or updates or DLC for the game. This includes Shop, Story mode and some of the levels.
